title: Giro d’Italia Stage 16: Del Toro Cracks but Clings to Pink, Carapaz Blows Up GC, Roglič Abandons in Mountain Mayhem
content:
XDS-Astana go 1-2 on brutal mountain stage, UAE teammates Del Toro and Ayuso lose time, top-3 on GC separated by only 31 seconds after stage 16 thriller.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 16: Del Toro Cracks but Clings to Pink, Carapaz Blows Up GC, Roglič Abandons in Mountain Mayhem on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
